actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Department of Housing and Urban Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making lump sum relocation assistance payments, except under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Housing and Urban Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making lump sum relocation assistance payments except for moving expenses or a purchase down payment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of Housing and Urban Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making lump sum relocation assistance payments, except under certain circumstances.
